Package com.eemi.ext4j.client.ui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoxComponent
    Base class for any visual Component that uses a box container.
    Button
    A simple class to display different styles of buttons.
    ButtonGroup
    Provides a container for arranging a group of related Buttons in a tabular manner
    Chart
    Charts provide a flexible way to achieve a wide range of data visualization capablitities.
    CheckBox
    Single checkbox field.
    CheckboxGroup
    FieldContainer is a derivation of Container that implements the Labelable mixin.
    ColorPicker
    A specialized SplitButton that contains a menu of CheckItem elements.
    ComboBox
    A combobox control with support for autocomplete, remote-loading, paging and many other features.
    ComboBox.Mode  
    ComboBox.Trigger  
    ComponentFactory
    Component factory class.
    Container
    Base class for any Component that can contain other components.
    ContainerButton  
    CycleButton
    A specialized SplitButton that contains a menu of CheckItem elements.
    DataView
    A mechanism for displaying data using custom layout templates and formatting.
    DateField
    Provides a date input field with a DatePicker dropdown and automatic date validation.
    DatePicker
    This class is used by the com.eemi.ext4j.client.form.field.Date field to allow browsing and selection of valid dates in a popup next to the field, but may also be used with other components.
    Display
    A display-only text field which is not validated and not submitted.
    DrawComponent
    The Draw Component is a surface in which sprites can be rendered.
    Editor
    A base editor field that handles displaying/hiding on demand and has some built-in sizing and event handling logic.
    FieldContainer
    FieldContainer is a derivation of Container that implements the Labelable mixin.
    FieldSet
    A container for grouping sets of fields, rendered as a HTML fieldset element.
    File
    A display-only text field which is not validated and not submitted.
    FlashComponent
    A simple Component for displaying an Adobe Flash SWF movie.
    FooterToolBar  
    Form
    Provides input field management, validation, submission, and form loading services for the collection of Field instances within a Container.
    FormPanel
    FormPanel provides a standard container for forms.
    GridPanel
    Grids are an excellent way of showing large amounts of tabular data on the client side.
    GridPanelHeader
    Simple header class which is used for on NotificationContainer and Window
    Hidden
    A basic hidden field for storing hidden values in forms that need to be passed in the form submit.
    HtmlEditor
    Provides a lightweight HTML Editor component.
    Image
    Simple helper class for easily creating image components.
    Label
    A label class for Forms.
    Layer
    An extended ExtElement object that supports a shadow and shim, constrain to viewport and automatic maintaining of shadow/shim positions.
    LayerConfig
    Configuration class for a Layer.
    LoadMask
    A modal, floating Component which may be shown above a specified Element, or a specified Component while loading data.
    Menu
    A menu object.
    MenuCheckItem  
    MenuColorPicker  
    MenuDatePicker  
    MenuItem
    A base class for all menu items that require menu-related functionality such as click handling, sub-menus, icons, etc.
    MenuSeparator
    Adds a separator bar to a menu, used to divide logical groups of menu items.
    MessageBox
    Utility class for generating different styles of message boxes.
    MultiSlider
    Slider which supports vertical or horizontal orientation, keyboard adjustments, configurable snapping, axis clicking and animation.
    NumberField
    A numeric text field that provides automatic keystroke filtering to disallow non-numeric characters, and numeric validation to limit the value to a range of valid numbers.
    PagingToolbar
    As the number of records increases, the time required for the browser to render them increases.
    Panel
    Panel is a container that has specific functionality and structural components that make it the perfect building block for application-oriented user interfaces.
    PanelHeader
    Simple header class which is used for on Panel and Window
    Picker
    An abstract class for fields that have a single trigger which opens a "picker" popup below the field, e.g.
    ProgressBar
    An updateable progress bar component.
    PropertyGridPanel
    Grids are an excellent way of showing large amounts of tabular data on the client side.
    Radio
    Single radio field.
    RadioGroup
    A field container which has a specialized layout for arranging Ext.form.field.Radio controls into columns, and provides convenience Ext.form.field.Field methods for getting, setting, and validating the group of radio buttons as a whole.
    Shadow
    Simple class that can provide a shadow effect for any element.
    Shadow.Type  
    Slider
    Slider which supports vertical or horizontal orientation, keyboard adjustments, configurable snapping, axis clicking and animation.
    Spinner
    A field with a pair of up/down spinner buttons.
    SplitButton
    A split button that provides a built-in dropdown arrow that can fire an event separately from the default click event of the button.
    TablePanel
    TablePanel is the basis of both TreePanel and GridPanel.
    TableView  
    TabPanel
    A basic tab container.
    Text
    This class encapsulates a drawn text item as rendered by the Ext.draw package within a Component which can be then used anywhere in an ExtJS application just like any other Component.
    TextArea
    Multiline text field.
    TextField
    A basic text field.
    TimeField
    Provides a time input field with a time dropdown and automatic time validation.
    TimePicker
    A time picker which provides a list of times from which to choose.
    Tool
    This class is used to display small visual icons in the header of a panel.
    ToolBar
    Basic Toolbar class.
    ToolBarFill
    A non-rendering placeholder item which instructs the Toolbar's Layout to begin using the right-justified button container.
    ToolBarSeparator
    A simple class that adds a vertical separator bar between toolbar items (css class: 'x-toolbar-separator').
    ToolBarSpacer
    A simple element that adds extra horizontal space between items in a toolbar.
    ToolBarText
    A simple class that renders text directly into a toolbar.
    ToolTip
    ToolTip is aTip implementation that handles the common case of displaying a tooltip when hovering over a certain element or elements on the page.
    TreePanel
    The TreePanel provides tree-structured UI representation of tree-structured data.
    TreeView
    Used as a view by TreePanel .
    TriggerField
    Provides a convenient wrapper for TextFields that adds a clickable trigger button (looks like a combobox by default).
    Viewport
    A specialized container representing the viewable application area (the browser viewport).
    VTypes
    Basic pre-created validation types.
    Window
    A specialized panel intended for use as an application window.
